channel.title: Destiny Pkz
channel.description:
This will be my first recorded server/project so please no flaming!
[U] [SIZE=5][COLOR=Blue]Goals[/COLOR][/SIZE][/U] [SIZE=4][COLOR=Lime][COLOR=PaleGreen]Specials - 95%[/COLOR] Combat - 80% Skills - 95% (I'm only changing areas and skill xp, not the actual skills [COLOR=DarkGreen]Minigames - 100% (Not changing again)[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Setting up new wild areas - 0%[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Adding rewards to pking and such - 0%[/COLOR] [COLOR=Orange]Shops - 30%[/COLOR] [COLOR=SandyBrown]Other crap - 15%[SIZE=1][COLOR=Black]
[/COLOR][/SIZE][/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE] [SIZE=4][COLOR=White]Updates[/COLOR][/SIZE] [U]3/14/09[/U] Downloaded base Did some small changes to combat Changed most of shops Wrote page :) Added items kept on death interface to server and client Finished Object Training Arena [U]3/17/09[/U] Almost done creating completely new minigame [U]3/18/09[/U] Finished minigame, just need to work out the bugs, will post video soon Fixed DDS spec, instant double hit [U]3/21/09[/U] Added kinda summoning and almost full cats [U]3/22/09[/U] Worked out most bugs in minigame and posted video
I added an Object training area where you can enter for 10 seconds for 5m, 20 seconds for 10m, 30 seconds for 15m, 1 minute for 30m, and 2 minutes for 60m. Videos: Obj Train: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xhnPAqTxzRo
New Minigame: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sZhkn2Z6byU

item.title: Destiny Pkz
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

public boolean:

You are not alowed to request coders,

If you have approval by the administrators then you can put together a development team, but I have not looked into it so I don’t know if your publicly allowed to recruit developers.

Owner Fritz:

I don’t want a development team

It looks like you do.

Coders

Graphics
--------

item.title: Destiny Pkz
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Fritz Owner Fritz
item.description:
@Owner_Fritz wrote:

joeyjoe9876: The object training is part of the economy, it costs REAL money to do so it is a goal and reason to actually get money

jc22493: I don’t want a development team, i just want some people to help with npc following and other fixes. Also I am using a modified delta source

public boolean: Since when?

rash: Show me some proof of your coding/graphics work please.

Read full topic

item.title: Destiny Pkz
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Fritz Owner Fritz
item.description:
@Owner_Fritz wrote:

This will be my first recorded server/project so please no flaming!


[SIZE=5][COLOR=Blue]Goals[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=Lime][COLOR=PaleGreen]Specials - 95%[/COLOR]
Combat - 80%
Skills - 95% (I’m only changing areas and skill xp, not the actual skills
[COLOR=DarkGreen]Minigames - 100% (Not changing again)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]Setting up new wild areas - 0%[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]Adding rewards to pking and such - 0%[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]Shops - 30%[/COLOR]
[COLOR=SandyBrown]Other crap - 15%[SIZE=1][COLOR=Black]

[/COLOR][/SIZE][/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=White]Updates[/COLOR][/SIZE]
3/14/09
Downloaded base
Did some small changes to combat
Changed most of shops
Wrote page
Added items kept on death interface to server and client
Finished Object Training Arena
3/17/09
Almost done creating completely new minigame
3/18/09
Finished minigame, just need to work out the bugs, will post video soon
Fixed DDS spec, instant double hit
3/21/09
Added kinda summoning and almost full cats
3/22/09
Worked out most bugs in minigame and posted video

I added an Object training area where you can enter for 10 seconds for 5m, 20 seconds for 10m, 30 seconds for 15m, 1 minute for 30m, and 2 minutes for 60m.
Videos:
Obj Train:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xhnPAqTxzRo

New Minigame:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sZhkn2Z6byU
